feature.label: WHIS StateViewer
feature.description: The StateVIEWER Kernel Aware Plug-in for Eclipse provides a snapshot view of the Free/OpenRTOS or SafeRTOS data structures presented in a meaningful tabular format. This allows the current state of tasks and queues to be inspected directly from within the Eclipse Workbench IDE.
